original_text: For death is come up into our windows, and is entered into our palaces, to cut off the children from without, and the young men from the streets.
korean_text: 무릇 사망이 우리 창문을 통하여 넘어 들어오며 우리 궁실에 들어오며 밖에서는 자녀들을 거리에서는 청년들을 멸절하려 하느니라

sentences.original_text: For death is come up into our windows,
and is entered into our palaces,
to cut off children from without,
and young men from the streets.
